oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of an airplane, volcanic lava, an actress, a woman carrying a baby in a basket, celebrities, a man with an antique musical instrument, a pilot, a building being demolished, and two ads. Nashville Banner, 1931 January 25.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Nace, Paul; Booth, Harry; Roth, Lillian; Hamlin, Mrs. John; Hamlin, Robert; Hamlin, Edward; Rockefeller, John D.; Curci, Galli; Samuels, Homer; Long, W. F.; Astor, G.; Shepherd, Mrs. Bruce P.; Milligan, J. G.
Nashville Banner
Airplanes; Volcanic rock; Actresses; Group portraits; Celebrities; Musical instruments; Air pilots; Demolition
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of an airplane which is also a boat, volcanic lava from Mt. Merapi, an actress, a Nashville woman carrying a baby in a basket, John D. Rockefeller with musicians, a Nashville man with an antique musical instrument which he repaired, a pilot, a Seattle courthouse being demolished, and two ads. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: International Newsreel
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:relation: Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
